CakeProvision

Provides structures and functions to represent a character in memory.  A provision is a combination of a character’s gear, their effects, and familiar.  It is a in-memory implementation of these settings to allow a script to make changes, then view the resulting effects on the character without actually calling the server or changing the gear.  This is important when considering the effects of item usage or just reducing server usage.

The general intent of the provision system is give the framework for scripts to make theoretical changes to a character, then determine what is the best or the cost to implement it, then to finally apply the changes to the character.

This script provides the following

  • The record to represent all these elements in a single object.
  • Functions to retrieve the current provision.
  • Functions for applying the provision to the character.
  • Functions for getting numerical modifiers from the provision instead of directly from KoLmafia.

cake_current_provisionBuild a provision record from the character’s current gear, effects, and familiar.

Constants

Combat Frequencies

CAKE_INCREASE_COMBATIndicates combat frequency should be increased.
CAKE_NORMAL_COMBATIndicates that combat frequency shouldn’t change.
CAKE_DECREASE_COMBATIndicated combat frequency should be decreased.

cake_provision

Summary
Variables
item_slotsContains a map of the items for every slot for the character.
item_locksContains the locked state of the appropriate slot.
familiar_slotContains the familiar for this provision.
familiar_lockIf this is true, then scripts should not change the familiar slot.
effectsContains the effects to activate or keep activated in the provision.
remove_effectsContains the effects that need to be removed.

Variables

item_slots

item [slot] item_slots

Contains a map of the items for every slot for the character.  If there is none, $item[none] will be used.

item_locks

boolean [slot] item_locks

Contains the locked state of the appropriate slot.  If one of the values is true, then the associated slot should not be changed by scripts.

familiar_slot

familiar familiar_slot

Contains the familiar for this provision.

familiar_lock

boolean familiar_lock

If this is true, then scripts should not change the familiar slot.

effects

int [effect] effects

Contains the effects to activate or keep activated in the provision.

remove_effects

int [effect] remove_effects

Contains the effects that need to be removed.  If an effect is not listed in either effects or remove_effects, then it is ignored by the script.

Summary
Functions
cake_current_provisionBuild a provision record from the character’s current gear, effects, and familiar.
cake_get_maximize_exclusionsThis returns a formatted string with the exclusions from the provision’s locked slots.

Functions

cake_current_provision

cake_provision cake_current_provision()

Build a provision record from the character’s current gear, effects, and familiar.

Returns

A cake_provision record that represents the character’s gear and effects.

cake_get_maximize_exclusions

string cake_get_maximize_exclusions(cake_provision provision)

This returns a formatted string with the exclusions from the provision’s locked slots.  For example, if hat and acc1 are locked, it will return “-hat, -acc1” to have them excluded from the `maximize` line.  If there is at least one exclusion, it will be started with a comma (“,”).

cake_remove_conflicting_effects

void cake_remove_conflicting_effects(cake_provision provision,
int combat_frequency)

This removes anything that would conflict with +combat, such as -combat effects.  This doesn’t actually remove it but adds those effects to the effects_to_remove list.

This only supports +combat, -combat at the moment.

cake_provision_pirate_outfit

boolean cake_provision_pirate_outfit(cake_provision provision)

Marks the provision record to wear the best pirate outfit.  If the player has fledges, it uses that, otherwise it attempts to wear the full outfit.  If one cannot be worn, then it returns false.  Any slot picked will be locked to indicate it should not be considered.  If the player already has an item equipped, this just locks the slot without moving it around.

cake_provision_outfit_accessor

void cake_provision_outfit_accessory(cake_provision provision,
item current_item)

cake_provision_outfit

boolean cake_provision_outfit(cake_provision provision,
location current_location)

Applies any outfit or equipment needed to adventure in a specific location.  The provision record slots will be locked for an outfit needed, but this won’t unlock a slot.

main

void main()

Reports information about the CakeProvision library and performs a short sanity check/example on the system.
